Description: Moodle is a free and open-source learning management system.
Name: Moodle

Methods.Name: Reset User Password
Methods.Description: Reset a user's password.

Methods.Name: Get User By Email
Methods.Description: Get a user with the given email address.

Methods.Name: Update User
Methods.Description: Update an existing user.

Methods.Name: Create User
Methods.Description: Create a new user.

Methods.Name: Get User By ID
Methods.Description: Get a user with the given ID.

Methods.Name: Get Users Grades
Methods.Description: Get the course grades for a given user.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Get a list of all users in the system.

Methods.Name: Get Group Members
Methods.Description: Get a list of group members.

Methods.Name: Create Grouping
Methods.Description: Create a grouping.

Methods.Name: Delete Grouping
Methods.Description: Delete a grouping.

Methods.Name: Create Group
Methods.Description: Create a group.

Methods.Name: Unassign Grouping
Methods.Description: Unassign a grouping.

Methods.Name: Get Activity Group Mode
Methods.Description: Gets the effective group mode used in a given activity.

Methods.Name: Assign Grouping
Methods.Description: Assign a Group from a Grouping.

Methods.Name: Delete Group
Methods.Description: Delete a group.

Methods.Name: Update Grouping
Methods.Description: Update a grouping.

Methods.Name: Get Grouping
Methods.Description: Returns grouping details for the ID specified.

Methods.Name: List User Course Group Membership
Methods.Description: Returns all groups in specified course for the specified user.

Methods.Name: Get Activity Allowed Groups
Methods.Description: Gets a list of groups that the user is allowed to access within the specified activity.

Methods.Name: List Groupings in Course
Methods.Description: List groupings in a course.

Methods.Name: Update Group
Methods.Description: Update a group.

Methods.Name: Get Group
Methods.Description: Returns group details for the ID specified.

Methods.Name: Add User to Group
Methods.Description: Add a user to a group.

Methods.Name: Remove User from Group
Methods.Description: Remove a user from a group.

Methods.Name: List Groups in Course
Methods.Description: Returns group details for course ID supplied.

Methods.Name: Enrol User
Methods.Description: Enrol a user to a given course.

Methods.Name: List Courses
Methods.Description: Get a list of all courses in the system.

Methods.Name: List New Courses
Methods.Description: Get a list of all new courses in the system.

Methods.Name: Update Course
Methods.Description: Update a course.

Methods.Name: Create Course
Methods.Description: Create a new course.

Methods.Name: Update Enrolment Status
Methods.Description: Update an enrolments status.

Methods.Name: Unenrol User
Methods.Description: Unenrol a user from a given course.

Methods.Name: List Updated Courses
Methods.Description: Get a list of all updated courses in the system.
